name: 黃瀅瑛
objective: 此課程旨在使學生了解如何以科學方法研究物理刺激與認知感官之間的關係，並採用信號偵測理論，進而考量人因工程於產品、系統設計之應用。
schedule:
Week      Date      Session/topic
1         Feb 23    Introduction
2         Mar 1     No class
3         Mar 8     No class
4         Mar 15    Psychophysical measurement of thresholds
5         Mar 22    The classical psychophysical methods
6         Mar 29    Exercise I- Adaptive psychophysical methods
7         Apr 5     No class
8         Apr 12    Classical psychophysical theory
9         Apr 19    Oral presentation (ch. 1, 2, 3)    (Mid-term exam week)
10        Apr 26    The theory of signal detection
11        May 3     Procedures and applications of TSD
12        May 10    Exercise II- TSD & applications
13        May 17    The measurement of sensory attributes
14        May 24    Oral presentation (ch. 4, 5, 6)　　
15        May 31    Psychophysical ratio scaling
16        Jun 7     The psychophysical law
17        Jun 14    Exercise III- Experimental setup　　
18        Jun 21    Oral presentation (ch. 7, 8)    (Final exam week)
scorePolicy:
Oral presentation (40%)  　　
Written report (40%) 
Performance in class (20%)
materials: Gescheider GA (1985). Psychophysics: Method, Theory, and Application, 2nd ed., Lawerence Earlbaum, Hillsdale.
